Key Match Events: Ivan Schranz scored the opening goal for Slovakia on 25 minutes
Jude Bellingham scored an overhead kick in the 95th minute to equalize the match
Harry Kane headed home from a recycled set piece in the first minute of extra time to give England a 2-1 lead
Post-Match Reflections: England's performance was disappointing during the first half
England's comeback in the second half and extra time was a sign of resilience
Gareth Southgate's job may be in jeopardy if England does not improve their performance against Switzerland
Miscellaneous Highlights: England failed to record a shot on target in the first half of a knockout game at a major tournament for the first time since the 1986 World Cup quarter-final
Others: The match was played at the AufSchalke Arena
England will play Switzerland in the quarter-final of Euro 2024
